data.text:
@EricTopol @G_Commish @austenhufford Yeah, the iPhone wrist monitor that tells everything INCLUDING your mood, came out of the blue. Clean out of the blue. So ppl really do still read the WSJ. Wow! 
Here, this’s for your next aspiring entrepreneur: “Feel like shit…Test your shit” w/our new patented PooP Scoop Swab.
@EricTopol @austenhufford It finished as fast as it started...
@EricTopol @austenhufford Home test?? Did you receive yours???
